mapper.select: select * from game_schedule where (home_team_id=#{team} or away_team_id=#{team})

choose.when: select * from game_schedule WHERE game_date BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

mapper.select: select gs.game_date, gs.game_time, gs.stad_id, gs.home_team_id,gs.game_id, tns.stad_url, tns.stad_field_url, tns.team_logo_url from game_schedule gs join team_n_stadium tns on gs.home_team_id = tns.team_id where gs.game_id = #{game_id}

select gs.game_date, gs.game_time, gs.stad_id, gs.away_team_id, tns.stad_url, tns.stad_field_url, tns.team_logo_url from game_schedule gs join team_n_stadium tns on gs.away_team_id = tns.team_id where gs.game_id = #{game_id}
